item.title: SQL基础
item.description: 目录 start SQL 目录 end|2020-04-27 23:42| SQL 基础SQL语言的学习使用 soarSQL Optimizer And Rewriter 条件语句 case when then else end 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 update table_test set mark = case when id = 2 then '2' when id = 5 then '5' else '' end where id in (2,5);
